items.sentence: Tom wondered how difficult it would be to find a job in Boston.
Tom wondered if Mary knew John had spent three years in prison.
Tom wondered if it was Mary who had sent him the box of apples.
Tom wondered where Mary was going to spend her summer vacation.
Tom wondered whether he should let Mary go to Boston with John.
Tom wouldn\'t have been able to manage without Mary\'s support.
Tom and Mary have been at odds with each other for a long time.
If you ever want to get better, you have to take this medicine.
Why did you do that without telling Tom what you were going to?
You have to understand that your parents are worried about you.
